Introduction

Taeho, formerly known as Doha, is a South Korean singer. He was the leader of the boy group F.able until he left the group on August 24th 2020, a little over a month after their debut. He took legal action against his former company, Haeirum Entertainment.

After leaving F.able, he became a member of the pre-debut group UTH, but left before disbandment. He is currently a member of AMBITION, an upcoming boy group, who have already started their promotion in Japan.

On January 24 2024 his company announced he has left Ambition due to personal reasons.
